caption.p: ( a) The nodal segment of C. nutans that was used in the experiments: ( b) the regenerated C. nutans at 4-week-old inoculated onto the Murashige and Skoog (MS) media supplemented with 12 µM BAP; ( c) the C. nutans plantlet at 6-week-old inoculated onto the MS media supplemented with 12 µM BAP; ( d) callus formation at the basal of C. nutans explant in the MS media supplemented with auxins.
